sourcesContent:
import React, { useState }from 'react';
import {Card, Layout, DisplayText, TextStyle} from '@shopify/polaris';
import store from 'store-js';
import MapChart from "./MapChart";
import ReactTooltip from "react-tooltip";
import price_sensitive_market from "../functions/price_sensitive_market";



export default function Main_data(props) {  
    const [content, setContent] = useState("");
    const currency_list = price_sensitive_market(props.maps)
    



    return (
    
          <Layout>

              <Layout.Section oneHalf>
             
              <TextStyle variation="strong">Price Change Magnitude the Past 30 Days</TextStyle>
                <MapChart setTooltipContent={setContent} />
                <ReactTooltip>{content}</ReactTooltip>  
       
              </Layout.Section>
              <Layout.Section secondary>
 
              <TextStyle variation="strong">Your Most Price Sentitive Markets</TextStyle>
              <Card>
                EUR
                Countries: France, Italy, Germany
              </Card>
              <Card>
                  CAD
                  Countries: Canada
                  </Card>
                  <Card>
                  GBP
                  Countries: UK
                  </Card>
                  <TextStyle variation="strong">Your Most Price Volatile Markets</TextStyle>
                  <Card>
                EUR
                Countries: France, Italy, Germany
              </Card>
              <Card>
                  CAD
                  Countries: Canada
                  </Card>
                  <Card>
                  GBP
                  Countries: UK
                  </Card>
      
              </Layout.Section>
      
          </Layout>


    );
  }
